I'm Ethan Epperson

Hi, and welcome to my portfolio! I am a soon to be graduate of the University of Louisville with a degree in Computer Information Systems focused in cybersecurity. In a world fraught with vulnerabilities, my unwavering dedication to cybersecurity fuels my mission: safeguarding others through the power of technology. I have had the wonderful experience of working in healthcare cybersecurity, where I've honed my technical cyber defense and problem-solving skills.

Work Experience

I completed a cloud security support engineer internship in the Summer of 2023 with Providence St. Joseph Health based in Renton, Washington. I had the opportunity to immerse myself in healthcare cybersecurity by working with Azure cloud security solutions and gaining hands-on experience with Microsoft Sentinel and Azure Active Directory (Microsoft Entra-ID). I was able to gain a better understanding of how cloud SOC teams operate, detection and monitoring techniques in the cloud, and how healthcare security auditing and governance works. You can find more details of this position in my resume.

This upcoming Summer I will be completing a network support internship with Stockyards Bank & Trust at their main branch located in Louisville, KY. I am excited to gain more hands-on network experience through this position.
